name: Aspect Ratios with Type Overlay Version 2.0
description:
What is it?

Deploy fixed aspect ratios into your designs and keep the proportions while scaling your designs


...Please drag horizontally to keep the effect live...


What's New !

  • Added top and Center Text Overlays
  • Drop downs turned to toggles
  • Cleaned the Layer Structure


Why did I made this?

I know there are already some similar works in the community and I don't intend to disrespect them nor I consider their work amateur.


I just wanted to make it easy for the users to add text overlays without overwhelming them with lot of layers and all, because I felt those things with the existing or previous Aspect ratio tools of should I say files.


Hope you guys find this small effort useful and please let me know if any of you guys find any error or fault. I'll try my best to fix them in the next update.


What you can do with this

You can deploy two orientations for each ratio:

  • landscape
  • Portrait
  • Also supports Golden Ratios for each

You can manipulate text wrapper from layer panel to achieve any of the following

  • Simple text overlays
  • Add icons
  • Add Tags, Titles and Subtitles
  • and what not
